S08n640:1: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
S08n640:2: asti mañjuśrīḥ aparamapi paṭavidhānarahasyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kanyasaṃ nāma |
S08n640:4: pūrvanirdiṣṭenaiva vidhinā śilpibhiḥ sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ tiryak tathaiva samaṃ caturasraṃ pūrvavat paṭaścitrāpayitavyaḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairaṅgaiḥ ||
S08n640:5: ādau tāvadāryamañjuśrīḥ siṃhāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ bāladārakarūpī pūrvavat dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ samantaprabhā arciṣo nirgacchamānaścārurūpī citrāpayitavyaḥ ||
S08n640:6: vāmapārśve āryasamantabhadaḥ ratnopalasthitaḥ camaravyagrahastaḥ cintāmaṇivāmavinyastakaraḥ priyaṅguśyāmavarṇaḥ pūrvavaccitrāpayitavyaḥ ||
S08n640:9: adhaśca siṃhāsanāt kanakavarṇaḥ parvato yāvat paṭānte citrāpayitavyaḥ |
S08n640:10: paṭāntakoṇasya āryamañjuśriyasya siṃhāsanasyādhastād dakṣiṇapārśve yamāntakaḥ krodharājā pūrvavaccitrāpayitavyaḥ |
S08n640:15: upariṣṭācca paṭakoṇāvasthitau parvataprāgbhārasaṃśliṣṭau utpatamānavimānapuṣpaughamutsṛjamānau śuddhāvāsakāyikau devaputrau śuddhaśca nāma viśuddhaśca nāma pūrvavaccitrāpayitavyau ||
S08n640:18: kanyasaṃ nāmato hyetat paṭaḥ śreyo kṣudrakarmasu ||
S08n640:19: yat kṛtaṃ kāritaṃ cāpi pāpaṃ karma sudāruṇam |
S08n640:21: paṭaṃ tu dṛṣṭamātraṃ vai tatkṣaṇādeva mucyate |
S08n640:23: kanyasaṃ tu paṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalā nāyāti ṣoḍaśīm |
S08n640:24: yat puṇyaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ pūjā kṛtvā tu tāpinām ||
S08n640:25: tat puṇyaṃ prāpnuyād vidvāṃ kanyase paṭadarśane |
S08n640:32: śāntikāni sadā kuryāt pauṣṭikāni tathā iha ||
